tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to a security misconfiguration due to insufficient validation of user permissions in company role configurations. This allows privilege escalation by manipulating the `id-company-role` or `id-permission` parameters. An attacker can exploit this by crafting malicious requests to gain elevated privileges, potentially resulting in unauthorized access to sensitive functions or data.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `spryker-shop/company-page` library to the patch version.
